metadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.5.16+commit.9c3226ce"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"_owner","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"_spender","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"_value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"Approval","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"_from","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"_to","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"_value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"Transfer","type":"event"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Contais the methods related to transfers and ERC20. Tellor.sol and TellorGetters.sol reference this library for function's logic.","methods":{"allowance(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address)":{"params":{"_spender":"address of spender of parties said balance","_user":"address of party with the balance"},"return":"Returns the remaining allowance of tokens granted to the _spender from the _user"},"allowedToTrade(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function returns whether or not a given user is allowed to trade a given amount and removing the staked amount from their balance if they are staked","params":{"_amount":"to check if the user can spend","_user":"address of user"},"return":"true if they are allowed to spend the amount being checked"},"approve(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function approves a _spender an _amount of tokens to use","params":{"_amount":"amount the spender is being approved for","_spender":"address"},"return":"true if spender appproved successfully"},"balanceOf(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address)":{"details":"Gets balance of owner specified","params":{"_user":"is the owner address used to look up the balance"},"return":"Returns the balance associated with the passed in _user"},"balanceOfAt(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"Queries the balance of _user at a specific _blockNumber","params":{"_blockNumber":"The block number when the balance is queried","_user":"The address from which the balance will be retrieved"},"return":"The balance at _blockNumber specified"},"doTransfer(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Completes POWO transfers by updating the balances on the current block number","params":{"_amount":"to transfer","_from":"address to transfer from","_to":"addres to transfer to"}},"getBalanceAt(Old2TellorStorage.Checkpoint[] storage,uint256)":{"details":"Getter for balance for owner on the specified _block number","params":{"_block":"is the block number to search the balance on","checkpoints":"gets the mapping for the balances[owner]"},"return":"the balance at the checkpoint"},"transfer(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"Allows for a transfer of tokens to _to","params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to send","_to":"The address to send tokens to"},"return":"true if transfer is successful"},"transferFrom(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to be transferred","_from":"The address holding the tokens being transferred","_to":"The address of the recipient"},"return":"True if the transfer was successful"},"updateBalanceAtNow(Old2TellorStorage.Checkpoint[] storage,uint256)":{"details":"Updates balance for from and to on the current block number via doTransfer","params":{"_value":"is the new balance","checkpoints":"gets the mapping for the balances[owner]"}}},"title":"Tellor Transfer"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"transferFrom(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Send _amount tokens to _to from _from on the condition it is approved by _from"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/C/company/code/tellorlegacy/contracts/oldContracts2/libraries/Old2TellorTransfer.sol":"Old2TellorTransfer"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/C/company/code/tellorlegacy/contracts/oldContracts2/libraries/Old2SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4c739bf840e32050daed076d0d1fb01f3ecaae4513fd6d22920115a3ece1857e","urls":["bzz-raw://605afafd211b5578087a99a1726aa712346b614544ffba3e0ee2ac2ebe0cc1ce","dweb:/ipfs/Qmd1KntV1XCwvk5B21kjcSvXq2tAgLTUDGz9cM5FNNAwNj"]},"/C/company/code/tellorlegacy/contracts/oldContracts2/libraries/Old2TellorStorage.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc8cdaa3ad2c6b9ff1d7da10b92294ddbf7ae43a7ff31a444ac1a2ad034a27346","urls":["bzz-raw://676bb6e03d356b6603ceb733fa3a5f0cbd752eb12a9f8b59325d2b2f606d55e4","dweb:/ipfs/QmSrZoFzWVxq7V9JK7j785xMDmVPQKatPiRj3xq4MpKx3h"]},"/C/company/code/tellorlegacy/contracts/oldContracts2/libraries/Old2TellorTransfer.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8f0c71efcd23d9d45278a8e3bd8a05fac0172781c8593440f95ed3457675b129","urls":["bzz-raw://29e1dc92b04b1c8f3b7735debe447914dc8eaef8821118738416eb06674088ec","dweb:/ipfs/QmTiUNSAkbxZyifx1V61sDXcmmX3Ew4iHMsLcGoJBhqkrV"]}},"version":1}

devdoc.details: Contais the methods related to transfers and ERC20. Tellor.sol and TellorGetters.sol reference this library for function's logic.

params._spender: address of spender of parties said balance
params._user: address of party with the balance

allowance(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorag.return: Returns the remaining allowance of tokens granted to the _spender from the _user

allowedToTrade(Old2TellorStorage.TellorS.details: This function returns whether or not a given user is allowed to trade a given amount and removing the staked amount from their balance if they are staked

params._amount: to check if the user can spend

allowedToTrade(Old2TellorStorage.TellorS.return: true if they are allowed to spend the amount being checked

approve(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorageS.details: This function approves a _spender an _amount of tokens to use

params._amount: amount the spender is being approved for

params._user: is the owner address used to look up the balance

balanceOf(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorag.return: Returns the balance associated with the passed in _user

balanceOfAt(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStor.details: Queries the balance of _user at a specific _blockNumber

params._blockNumber: The block number when the balance is queried
params._user: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

doTransfer(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStora.details: Completes POWO transfers by updating the balances on the current block number

getBalanceAt(Old2TellorStorage.Checkpoin.details: Getter for balance for owner on the specified _block number

params._block: is the block number to search the balance on
params.checkpoints: gets the mapping for the balances[owner]

transfer(Old2TellorStorage.TellorStorage.details: Allows for a transfer of tokens to _to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to send
params._to: The address to send tokens to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred
params._from: The address holding the tokens being transferred

transferFrom(Old2TellorStorage.TellorSto.return: True if the transfer was successful

updateBalanceAtNow(Old2TellorStorage.Che.details: Updates balance for from and to on the current block number via doTransfer

params.checkpoints: gets the mapping for the balances[owner]

devdoc.title: Tellor Transfer

transferFrom(Old2TellorStorage.TellorSto.notice: Send _amount tokens to _to from _from on the condition it is approved by _from
